item.title: Rad Power Bikes’ batteries receive major fire risk warning

item.title: Tesla FSD software may not be approved by EU regulator after all

item.title: Hands on with Stickerbox, the AI-powered sticker maker for kids

item.title: AWS is spending $50B build AI infrastructure for the US government
item.description: AWS has been working with the U.S. government since 2011 and is now building AI infrastructure specifically for the entity.

item.title: Anthropic releases Opus 4.5 with new Chrome and Excel integrations
item.description: Anthropic has launched Opus 4.5, the latest version of its flagship model, with new integrations into Chrome and Excel.
